data.message: How come there's not an option for those who arnt your friend to only see jus your pic ? I have changed to no other search engines to find me , changed my FB email , and using my first name instead of my middle ! All my stuff is set to friends only ! Anything else I can do to stop my stalker x husband from bothering me ?

replies.message: Hey Elizabeth. We do have tips and tools to help you deal with bullying and harassment. Please reporting anything abusive here: http://on.fb.me/1vddXwb, and learn about tools to help you deal with bullying and harassment at: http://on.fb.me/1vddXfR. -Ryan
He is not my FB friend and is blocked but somehow can see enough of my profile to harass me
Maybe he's looking from someone else's profile.
Nope he's my x husband he found my FB link so then I changed some things just wondering why when you don't have anything set to public that public can see your pic and some of your timeline

I wondered the same thing. If everything is set for private how is the public able to see  anything beyond my photo, especially if they are 
blocked?
Did you make sure that users can't search for you by phone number or email? Try removing your cell number from it, or changing your number & email. I know that worked for me.
Cell number is not on and I changed FB email
